results.content:
An amazing course to start building React applications, the instructor is extremely great, he explains everything in different ways and shows us all the possible ways to work with React. If you're thinking about taking your career to the next level and learn something trendy, I really advise you in this course. Lastly, I want to thank the instructor for such a lovely course. 

I wish you all the best Chris!

results.content: Absolutely amazing course and above expectations for sure, as this course covers many basic and advanced things in React, but also I understood many fundamental thing in programming in general. Great course with step-by-step detailed examples. Thank you

results.content: Does not contain what the title of the course says. There is no React or Redux related stuff in the entire course!!! This is a click-bait to be honest. I wonder how this course has this high rating that duped me into purchasing it!!

response.content: Dear Yunus, thank you for your comment, but there was an update process. Now more than 10 new videos for React and Redux related staff are added in the course. You will be able to watch them follow the instructions and create React projects with SQL to save data. Thank you.
